name: Star Aegis (itch)
description:
Jim is an astronaut who is tasked with exploring a passing spaceship. But there is something that Jim's unit suspects is that Jim's ship is trying to contact the mysterious ship. but there was no reply at all.

Let's play

HOW  TO  PLAY

Press W,A,S,D to move

Press SPACE to jump

Press F to fly

Left  click to fire
